name: zephyr
description: A seamless, next-gen social experience built for speed, privacy, and effortless connection.
author: parazeeknova

scripts.postinstall: cd packages/db && pnpm dlx prisma generate
scripts.docker:clean:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker volume rm zephyr_postgres_data_dev zephyr_redis_data_dev zephyr_minio_data_dev && rm -f .dev-init
scripts.env:local: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');fs.copyFileSync('.env.example','.env');fs.copyFileSync(path.join('apps','web','.env.example'),path.join('apps','web','.env'));fs.copyFileSync(path.join('packages','db','.env.example'),path.join('packages','db','.env'));console.log('âœ… Environment files copied successfully');"
scripts.prisma:up: cd packages/db && pnpm prisma generate && pnpm prisma db push
scripts.dev:aio: pnpm install && pnpm run format && pnpm run env:local && pnpm run docker:dev && pnpm run prisma:up
